product_name: Boardworks Sirena Stand Up Paddle Board - Women's - 10' 4"
long_description: Performing as well in surf as it does on flatwater, this lightweight paddle board has a wide, stable design and a soft EVA deck for women paddlers with any level of experience.
short_description: Performing as well in surf as it does on flatwater, this lightweight paddle board has a wide, stable design and a soft EVA deck for women paddlers with any level of experience.
